name: Heroes of Civilizations
description: Strategy based cardgame, themed in ancient civilizations culture, wars and mythology. Fight in intense battles against other civilizations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3) or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Penryn) 2.53 GHz or equivalent Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD or equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space
